item.title: When you can be a 2D Anime Waifu Oshi
item.content:
I did the thing. Armed with my iPad (and iPhone) and a PC desktop, along with a general knowledge of how computer works.

The setup does not really require an Apple device but it works best because of Apple AR Kit.

Watch the test recording here

I just discovered Excalidraw in May and I could not stop using it. It’s an addiction. So here’s a diagram of the pipeline.

Thanks.
